mapper.select: select en.id, en.experience_notice_title, en.experience_notice_subtitle, en.experience_start_date, en.experience_end_date, en.experience_notice_status, en.experience_request_status, en.company_id, en.created_datetime, en.updated_datetime, jc.job_name as job_category_name, count(distinct re.id) as applicant_count, count(distinct sen.member_id) as save_count from tbl_experience_notice en join tbl_experience_job_category ejc on en.id = ejc.experience_notice_id join tbl_job_category jc on ejc.job_category = jc.id left join tbl_request_experience re on en.id = re.experience_notice_id left join tbl_save_experience_notice sen on en.id = sen.experience_notice_id where en.company_id = #{companyId} and en.experience_request_status = 'accept' group by en.id, jc.job_name order by en.id desc limit #{criteria.count} offset #{criteria.offset}
select count(distinct id) from tbl_experience_notice where company_id = #{companyId} and experience_request_status = 'accept'
select count(distinct id) from tbl_experience_notice where company_id = #{companyId} and experience_request_status = 'accept' and experience_notice_status = 'active'
mapper.update: update tbl_experience_notice set experience_notice_status = #{status}::status, updated_datetime = now() where id = #{noticeId}
mapper.select: select count(distinct re.id) as totalRequestCount, count(distinct case when en.experience_notice_status = 'active' and en.experience_request_status = 'accept' then re.id end) as activeRequestCount from tbl_experience_notice en left join tbl_request_experience re on en.id = re.experience_notice_id where en.company_id = #{companyId} and en.experience_request_status = 'accept'
